title: Azir Bug PLEASE FIX
body: After this most recent patch it seems that Azir was realeased with a bigger bug than was fixed while he was disabled. When his sand soldiers are auto attacking he moves in a random direction on his own and the sand soldiers stop auto attacking. Riot please fix. I love my bird and need him in tip top fighting condition.

replies.body:
We're aware of the issue and are working on it! ^-^ 

Azir has been re-enabled after fixing a few critical issues. We're aware of a lingering bug where Azir can start automatically moving after issuing soldier attack commands. However, because movement is canceled by other inputs and Azir is a high-input champion, we feel it didn't warrant leaving Azir disabled. It'll be fixed next patch!
